Package Model

Class GamePlay

java.lang.Object
Model.GamePlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISubject
public class GamePlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubject
This Class maintains the state of the game and current player. The methods of this class are called by Controller. This class has singleton implementation.
